name: process-document
description: Cloud Function to process uploaded documents via Document AI

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy processDocument --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-topic document-upload --entry-point processDocument --region asia-south1 --set-env-vars GCP_PROJECT_ID=indialawai-prod,STORAGE_BUCKET=indialawai-prod-documents,DOCUMENT_AI_LAYOUT_PROCESSOR=projects/indialawai-prod/locations/asia-south1/processors/7589e7eaf9f9db3d --project indialawai-prod
